event_name: A Weekend Workshop of Milonguero Style Tango
price: $150 CAD/pp for Canadian Single Leads and Couples, $140 USD/pp for American Single Leads and Couples
location: The Abbey, Cumberland, Vancouver Island, BC
description: An experiential and exploratory weekend of Milonguero Style Tango with Liz Haight. Open to intermediate and advanced Tango dancers. Maximum 30 dancers (role-balanced). For questions or to register please contact Steve Morgan at stevemorgan42@gmail.com.
